short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that re-adds the Google Maps link to searches.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Since EU passed the The Digital Markets Act (DMA), Google Search is no longer allowed to redirect the user (in the EU) to locations on Google Maps. This extension adds that functionality back. Find stores, restaurants, cities, countries etc. on the map by searching for them, just like you were able to do before the law change.

This project is open-source: 
https://github.com/AminoffZ/google-maps-button
